statements.sql: select * from information_schema.tables where table_schema = 'growmybiz-v2' and table_name = 'settings' and table_type = 'BASE TABLE'
select distinct `episodes`.`season_number` from `episodes` where `tv_show_id` = 1 group by `tv_show_id`, `season_number`

select * from `casts` where exists (select * from `tv_shows` inner join `cast_tv_show` on `tv_shows`.`id` = `cast_tv_show`.`tv_show_id` where `casts`.`id` = `cast_tv_show`.`cast_id` and `tv_shows`.`id` = 1)
select * from `tv_show_views` where (`user_id` = 1 and `tv_show_id` = 1 and `episode_id` is null and `ip_address` = '127.0.0.1') limit 1
select * from `tv_show_views` where `tv_show_views`.`tv_show_id` = 1 and `tv_show_views`.`tv_show_id` is not null
select sum(`duration`) as aggregate from `episodes` where `episodes`.`tv_show_id` = 1 and `episodes`.`tv_show_id` is not null

array:5 [ "data" => array:9 [ "tvShow" => App\Models\TvShow {#2846 #connection: "mysql" #table: "tv_shows" #primaryKey: "id" #keyType: "int" +incrementing: true #with: [] #withCount: [] +preventsLazyLoading: false #perPage: 15 +exists: true +wasRecentlyCreated: false #escapeWhenCastingToString: false #attributes: array:14 [ "id" => 1 "title" => "Merlin" "slug" => "merlin" "description" => """

Title: "Echoes of Destiny"

\n

In the heart-pounding cinematic journey that is "Echoes of Destiny," audiences are thrust into a world where destiny, love, and courage converge in an epic tale that spans generations. This visually stunning masterpiece weaves together elements of fantasy, romance, and adventure to deliver a gripping narrative that will leave you on the edge of your seat.

\n

Set in the mystical kingdom of Eloria, the story follows the intertwined fates of two extraordinary characters, Seraphina and Kaelan. Seraphina, a young woman with a mysterious past, discovers her unique magical abilities that hold the key to saving her kingdom from impending darkness. Her destiny becomes entwined with that of Kaelan, a brave and dashing warrior, chosen by fate to be her protector.

\n

As the two embark on a perilous journey filled with mythical creatures, treacherous landscapes, and ancient prophecies, they must confront their inner demons and insecurities while forging a powerful bond. Along the way, they encounter a diverse cast of characters, each with their own motives and secrets, adding layers of complexity to the story.

\n

"Echoes of Destiny" is not merely a tale of heroism and villainy; it's a story that explores the depth of human emotion. The chemistry between Seraphina and Kaelan ignites the screen, creating a love story that transcends time itself. Their emotional journey resonates with the audience, reminding us of the enduring power of love in the face of adversity.

\n

The film's breathtaking visuals and spellbinding special effects transport viewers to a world where magic is real, and the impossible becomes possible. The lush landscapes, intricate costumes, and awe-inspiring set designs create a visually captivating experience that lingers in the mind long after the credits roll.

\n

"Echoes of Destiny" is not just a movie; it's an immersive cinematic experience that takes you on a rollercoaster of emotions. It explores themes of destiny, sacrifice, and the eternal struggle between light and darkness. With its unforgettable characters, mesmerizing storytelling, and a musical score that tugs at the heartstrings, this film is destined to become a timeless classic.

\n

Prepare to be enchanted, thrilled, and moved as you embark on this epic adventure where destiny echoes through the ages. "Echoes of Destiny" is a monumental achievement in filmmaking that will leave you breathless and eager to embark on the journey all over again. Don't miss your chance to witness cinematic magic at its finest.

Title: "Echoes of Destiny"

\n

In the heart-pounding cinematic journey that is "Echoes of Destiny," audiences are thrust into a world where destiny, love, and courage converge in an epic tale that spans generations. This visually stunning masterpiece weaves together elements of fantasy, romance, and adventure to deliver a gripping narrative that will leave you on the edge of your seat.

\n

Set in the mystical kingdom of Eloria, the story follows the intertwined fates of two extraordinary characters, Seraphina and Kaelan. Seraphina, a young woman with a mysterious past, discovers her unique magical abilities that hold the key to saving her kingdom from impending darkness. Her destiny becomes entwined with that of Kaelan, a brave and dashing warrior, chosen by fate to be her protector.

\n

As the two embark on a perilous journey filled with mythical creatures, treacherous landscapes, and ancient prophecies, they must confront their inner demons and insecurities while forging a powerful bond. Along the way, they encounter a diverse cast of characters, each with their own motives and secrets, adding layers of complexity to the story.

\n

"Echoes of Destiny" is not merely a tale of heroism and villainy; it's a story that explores the depth of human emotion. The chemistry between Seraphina and Kaelan ignites the screen, creating a love story that transcends time itself. Their emotional journey resonates with the audience, reminding us of the enduring power of love in the face of adversity.

\n

The film's breathtaking visuals and spellbinding special effects transport viewers to a world where magic is real, and the impossible becomes possible. The lush landscapes, intricate costumes, and awe-inspiring set designs create a visually captivating experience that lingers in the mind long after the credits roll.

\n

"Echoes of Destiny" is not just a movie; it's an immersive cinematic experience that takes you on a rollercoaster of emotions. It explores themes of destiny, sacrifice, and the eternal struggle between light and darkness. With its unforgettable characters, mesmerizing storytelling, and a musical score that tugs at the heartstrings, this film is destined to become a timeless classic.

\n

Prepare to be enchanted, thrilled, and moved as you embark on this epic adventure where destiny echoes through the ages. "Echoes of Destiny" is a monumental achievement in filmmaking that will leave you breathless and eager to embark on the journey all over again. Don't miss your chance to witness cinematic magic at its finest.

\n

As the two embark on a perilous journey filled with mythical creatures, treacherous landscapes, and ancient prophecies, they must confront their inner demons and insecurities while forging a powerful bond. Along the way, they encounter a diverse cast of characters, each with their own motives and secrets, adding layers of complexity to the story.

\n

"Echoes of Destiny" is not merely a tale of heroism and villainy; it's a story that explores the depth of human emotion. The chemistry between Seraphina and Kaelan ignites the screen, creating a love story that transcends time itself. Their emotional journey resonates with the audience, reminding us of the enduring power of love in the face of adversity.

\n

The film's breathtaking visuals and spellbinding special effects transport viewers to a world where magic is real, and the impossible becomes possible. The lush landscapes, intricate costumes, and awe-inspiring set designs create a visually captivating experience that lingers in the mind long after the credits roll.

\n

"Echoes of Destiny" is not just a movie; it's an immersive cinematic experience that takes you on a rollercoaster of emotions. It explores themes of destiny, sacrifice, and the eternal struggle between light and darkness. With its unforgettable characters, mesmerizing storytelling, and a musical score that tugs at the heartstrings, this film is destined to become a timeless classic.

\n

Prepare to be enchanted, thrilled, and moved as you embark on this epic adventure where destiny echoes through the ages. "Echoes of Destiny" is a monumental achievement in filmmaking that will leave you breathless and eager to embark on the journey all over again. Don't miss your chance to witness cinematic magic at its finest.
